text: Hiori, have you identified any areas of concern?

Yes, there are a few things
I'd like to discuss and ask for.
Alright, I'll call in the staff then.
Good job, you've talked a lot.

Yeah, you said to speak
up about anything, so...

I ended up discussing
even the smallest details.

Like how the motif on the sleeves
shifts when moving vigorously...

Haha, I see.
...Do you think it'll turn out well?

Now, all that's left is to deliver the best
performance I can to those watching.
